channel.title: On Sannin...
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "On Sannin..."

item.title: Re: On Sannin...
item.content:encoded: Well…. because of the rollover problem (you know, the bug that caused some people to fail missions and such), I was allowed to join a day earlier than I normally would have been able to. I probably shouldn't have done that, but since they never really mentioned anything about that on the main page, I decided to just go ahead and join (it's not like I'm really exploiting it, or getting some extreme advantage from it). So I'll be back a day earlier than expected. I'll see ya guys in 2 days (as a Sannin). :)

item.title: Re: On Sannin...
item.content:encoded:
From my 3 alts I had no problem with entering 'Star5 HQ' for an hour to make a sannin.

It taken less than 30 minutes to accept my request.

I must say, thank you to this Epic Village, great people.

item.title: Re: On Sannin...
item.content:encoded:
Heh… that wasn't supposed to be taken entirely seriously. I'm fairly certain I can get in. Imaginary has only 45 members now, and with people coming in and out due to wanting to go Sannin, if it does get filled it won't be filled for long. Plus, the village's message reads:

"Currently accepting temporary members trying to complete the sannin exam. Don't apply unless you're already past the first part of the mission."

Also, I don't use IRC. Used to. Then my computer died. Never bothered to redownload it.

item.title: Re: On Sannin...
item.content:encoded:
try the bvs channel , i think a link to the random forum maybe was posted somewhere in this forum , i followed that and there found a link to an IRC channel where i met celeste of imaginary and from there i asked her to let me in for a while to go sannin and she did , the guys there are great and very welcoming.
also imaginary have every upgrade possible :shock:

item.title: Re: On Sannin...
item.content:encoded: Alright, I'm leaving today to head to Imaginary (if they'll accept me). I'll see you guys in 4 days, hopefully as a Sannin.

item.title: Re: On Sannin...
item.content:encoded: My only regret is that I can't take advantage of our summoning circle. =P

item.title: Re: On Sannin...
item.content:encoded: made sannin YAY! , I'm on my way back , 2 days and im home :)

item.title: Re: On Sannin...
item.content:encoded: congratulations guys , damn , am i the only one who didn't get accepted in a village with a monument yet or what lol , i might try a couple os S ranks while im there before i quit after i go Sannin but will leave the same day ;)

item.title: Re: On Sannin...
item.content:encoded:
Sannin accomplished. Now I'm parting with other legendaries.

Be back in 2 days when I'm sober again.

item.title: Re: On Sannin...
item.content:encoded: I made Sannin as well, so I'll be back in two days.

item.title: Re: On Sannin...
item.content:encoded: congratulations Jupiah , and yea I'm coming back eventually :) , also were there any empty slots say by 2moro morning cause thats when it would let me submit an application

item.title: Re: On Sannin...
item.content:encoded: Okay, I made Sannin, so I'm on my way back. See you soon.

item.title: Re: On Sannin...
item.content:encoded:
Trying to keep track of who's out going Sannin and who's going to come back eventually:

Lear

item.title: Re: On Sannin...
item.content:encoded: Okay, thanks.

item.title: Re: On Sannin...
item.content:encoded: Imaginary is still accepting temporary members, but priority will be given to allies. So if the village is full, you might be stuck outside for a while until someone leaves.

item.title: Re: On Sannin...
item.content:encoded:
Yeah, I'm definitely going to take this opportunity. BUT, I don't think I'm going to leave right away. I'm correct in assuming that I can stop just after passing the "I'm in the top three" part of the exam, and then wait a few days to leave, right? I've very close to getting the rest of the NWW items, so I'd really like to be able to go Sannin and then get the letter of Marque immediately afterword.

Anyway, I don't really know why you need to know all that, but at the very least, you'll have still have me as a jonin for a few days.

Also, do you happen to know of any villages with epic monuments that would willing to accept a jonin for a day or so to go sannin? I'm sure they're out there, I just don't know which ones are them. (Jupiah mentioned imaginary. Think they might accept another after Jupiah leaves?)

item.title: Re: On Sannin...
item.content:encoded: Anyone who heads out to go Sannin is most certainly welcome back post-Sannin. Like I said, I'd find no fault with anyone who does take this opportunity, it may be a one shot deal.

item.title: Re: On Sannin...
item.content:encoded:
I'm planing to go for Sannin. Just need little up jump with levels.(Day or two of A rank missions. I hope.)

I will be back if you take me back, Old SWATBU Lurker.

item.title: Re: On Sannin...
item.content:encoded:
I'm in the same boat as Jupiah. I was going to Sannin on my 21st day.

This however, makes it easier. I'm going to pick up the special mission and just leave it at the Epic Monument part and stick around wiki until I'm ready to loop. I still have a long way to go on the Letter of Marque.

Also, once this is over, should we perhaps open a forum of when we're planning on going for #1, so we don't compete with our village-mates?

item.title: Re: On Sannin...
item.content:encoded: i do not meet it either, level 44

item.title: Re: On Sannin...
item.content:encoded: Nor do I. I'm Level 45.

item.title: Re: On Sannin...
item.content:encoded: Well you'll have at least 1 Jonin around- seeing as I do not meet the level requirements. *waves small flag*

item.title: Re: On Sannin...
item.content:encoded: I was actually planning to attempt my Sannin run on my next 7 day stamina bonus anyway, so this situation is pretty darn convenient for me. I've contacted Celeste of Imaginary to request temporary membership. I'll let you know when he responds.

item.title: On Sannin...
item.content:encoded:
Okay, so there's a very weird circumstance right now. For the next 3 days, anyone who can take the Sannin mission will be able to auto-pass the "I'm in the top 3" requirement. This is due to a bug that occurred with stamina today. You still, however, need an Epic Monument to go Sannin, which is something the Wiki doesn't have. I understand anyone and everyone who would like to use this opportunity to go Sannin, but I do want to say something first.

To make Sannin now you need to do the following:

  1. Accept the Sannin mission, get to the part where it says "I'm in the top 3". Continue past that part.
  2. Leave your special mission on the screen that says "I'm in a Village with an Epic Monument"
  3. You now would need to leave the Wiki Village, and wait 2 days before you can join a village with an Epic Monument.
  4. The Village that has the Monument would let you in, you complete your quest, then you leave.
  5. You wait 2 more days, and come back to the Wiki.

Total travel time is 4 days, most of which you spend without a village and unable to do special missions. When you become Sannin, you get 20 more daily stamina (and any bloodline rank related bonuses). You also get Sannin's premium (+15% ryo permanent item, it loops), and a Bloodline related theme (which doesn't really do anything, to be honest). However you cannot patrol anymore.

Here's my concern. There are 27 Jonin in the Wiki Village. If everyone of them leaves to go Sannin, we literally lose half the Village for 4 days. That'll pretty much mean all development stops for that duration. That'd be really devastating to the Village, to say the least. This worries me, but I think we can make it through this.

Like I said, I'd completely understand anyone who wants to take advantage of this opportunity. But, things may be rocky for the next few days until all of this works itself out.
